org.readlogsfirst.api.logreader.basereader
Class MultiFileIterator

java.lang.Object
  org.readlogsfirst.api.logreader.basereader.MultiFileIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator<LogLine>
public class MultiFileIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<LogLine>

Base iterator on a group of files. It does not provide any caching or buffering. Files are supposed to be already open

Author:
fpacifici

Method Detail

hasNext

public boolean hasNext()
If a currentLine is ready it returns true, otherwise it tries to load one. If a new can be loaded true is returned otherwise false is returned. As long as a parsing exception is thrown, the exception is logged and a new line is searched. A parsing exception does not stop the iterator.

Specified by:
hasNext in interface java.util.Iterator<LogLine>
